title: Virat Kohli's Photo From Match With SA Has Given Us Desis Another Fantastic Meme To Trip Over
text:
Virat Kohli's Photo From Match With SA Has Given Us Desis Another Fantastic Meme To Trip Over

Virat Kohli's Photo From Match With SA Has Given Us Desis Another Fantastic Meme To Trip Over

Apart from being a world class player, Virat Kohli's expressions are killer too. Be it the death stares he sometimes gives his opponents or simply his smile, we all agree that Kohli is our hero. And just like any other public figure anything he does gets memed.

But this time it was BCCI that invited the whole Twitter community to meme the Indian Captain. The Twitter handle of the cricket board shared this funny picture of Virat Kohli which was taken during the third Test against South Africa in Ranchi and asked people to ‘caption this’. Then what, it was a meme fest. India won by 3-0, by the way.

The photo obviously went viral and people memed and photoshopped the shit out of it. Some changed the picture altogether and some simply posted their responses as to what they felt after looking at the image the first time.

Handpicked below are some of the best ones, there was no way to incorporate all of them here.

Someone : could you please look after my kid for 5 minutes?

Me : ok no problem sureeeee

Me *to the kid* : https://t.co/3wDIxsUbmZ — Pakchikpak Raja Babu (@HaramiParindey) October 21, 2019

Don't Miss 22.4 K SHARES 9 K SHARES 6.4 K SHARES 8.5 K SHARES 4.5 K SHARES

pic.twitter.com/48FTDZ47Hv — ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ (@theesmaarkhan) October 21, 2019

*Me on a public transport when a baby's parent looks away* https://t.co/Y7LfJNQfIL — Shreya Chauhan (@dumpendore) October 22, 2019

Bhaago Bachcho Sher Aya pic.twitter.com/GuMLXkl35F — Rohit Vertex Goswami 🇮🇳🚩 (@rohit_vertex) October 21, 2019

Now that the opportunity is public, may be you could come up with some memes inspired by the image too and post them in the comment section. No reason why that should not happen.
